import React from 'react'; import data from '../data'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function ProductScreen (props) { console.log(props.match.params.id); const movie = data.products.find(urlId => urlId.id === props.match.params.id); return (
Back to Movies

  • {movie.title}

  • {movie.year}
  • {movie.type}
  • Price: Rs.{movie.price}
  • status: {movie.status}
  • quantity:
) } export default ProductScreen;
